00100 // To take into account pressure constraint
00101 void Schema_Backward_Differentiation_base::store_equation_parameters(Equation_base& eqn, DoubleTab& stored_parameters)
00102 {
00103   if (nb_pas_dt()>nb_pas_dt_seuil())
00104     {
00105       if (sub_type(Navier_Stokes_std,eqn))
00106         {
00107           Navier_Stokes_std& navier_stokes = ref_cast(Navier_Stokes_std,eqn);
00108           stored_parameters = navier_stokes.pression().valeurs(); //store pressure at time tn
00109         }
00110     }
00111 }
00112 
00113 // To take into account pressure constraint
00114 void Schema_Backward_Differentiation_base::modify_equation_parameters(Equation_base& eqn, DoubleTab& stored_parameters)
00115 {
00116   if (nb_pas_dt()>nb_pas_dt_seuil())
00117     {
00118       if (sub_type(Navier_Stokes_std,eqn))
00119         {
00120           Navier_Stokes_std& navier_stokes = ref_cast(Navier_Stokes_std,eqn);
00121 
00122           DoubleTab& pressure = navier_stokes.pression().valeurs(); //pressure at time tnplus1 that is to say P(n+1)
00123           DoubleTab  delta_pressure(pressure);
00124 
00125           delta_pressure -= stored_parameters; //contains P(n+1) - P(n)
00126           delta_pressure /= coefficients()[nb_valeurs_passees()+1]; //take into account time scheme coefficient
00127           pressure        = stored_parameters;
00128           pressure       += delta_pressure;
00129         }
00130     }
00131 }
00132 
00133 void Schema_Backward_Differentiation_base::add_multi_timestep_data(const Equation_base& eqn, Matrice_Base& mat_morse, DoubleTab& secmem) const
00134 {
00135   double time_step               =  pas_de_temps();
00136   double effective_time_step     = -1.;
00137 
00138 // Remark for "pen" interger : we do not penalize matrices and right members even in the case
00139 // of Dirichlet or Symetrie boundary conditions
00140   int pen    = 0;
00141   int offset = 0;
00142   int i      = 0;
00143 
00144   effective_time_step     = coefficients()[nb_valeurs_passees()+1] * time_step;
00145 
00146 // Modification due to present time and past times
00147   DoubleTab dudt(eqn.inconnue().valeurs());
00148   DoubleTab tmp(dudt);
00149 
00150   dudt = 0.;
00151   for (i=0; i<nb_valeurs_passees()+1; ++i)
00152     {
00153       offset  = nb_valeurs_passees()-i + 1;//due to Initialiser_Champs() offset
00154       tmp     = eqn.inconnue().passe(offset);
00155       tmp    *= coefficients()[i] ;
00156       dudt   += tmp; //past times and present time if i==nb_valeurs_passees()
00157     }
00158 
00159   eqn.solv_masse().ajouter_masse(effective_time_step,secmem,dudt,pen);
00160   eqn.solv_masse().ajouter_masse(effective_time_step,mat_morse,pen);
00161 }
